author: Manvitha Katika
Manvitha Katika
text: It's high time that NTA should listen to JEE aspirants. Stop pretending that you don't know anything. No matter what you have to follow the law,you can't ignore Supreme court's order. Now be sensible and act accordingly. #JEEStudentsWantJustice  #jeemains2022 #JEEafterboards

author: Manvitha Katika
text:
It's high time that NTA should listen to JEE aspirants. Stop pretending that you don't know anything. No matter what you have to follow the law,you can't ignore Supreme court's order. Now be sensible and act accordingly. 
#JEEstudentswantjustice #jeemains2022 #JEEafterboards

author: Manvitha Katika
text:
Mailed these to NTA.I have covered all the valid points.Still if they don't postpone or give more attempts then I don't know what they are upto..

author: Manvitha Katika
text: Guys sign this petition and make the signatures reach the mark .we dont have much time.Share this.#jeemains2022 #JEEmain 2022 #jee #NTAjawabdo : INCREASE THE ATTEMPTS OF JEE MAIN 2022 TO 4. - Sign the Petition! https://t.co/ZZN7AtLMPT via @ChangeOrg_India
